msbt.message: Turkey Day is here at last! Well, I say that, but the mise en place is still being assembled, But it won't be long now, darling. Once the clock strikes nine, the plaza will become THE place to be!
I see I'm not the only one who had trouble sleeping. But the wait is over and Turkey Day is upon us!I hope you're ready for a gourmet feast! I know I am, !

I wonder if it's too late to whip up a dish or two for Turkey Day. Do I even have all the ingredients I'll need?Oh! I'm just thinking aloud. I can't decide whether to enjoy the food in the plaza or cook some of my own.It's been ages since I've had home cooking, but how often can you sit at the table of a world-class chef?Choices, choices, !
